title: After 3 hours this is what happens
body: So basically i waited 3 hours for the 6.18 update and when it finally finishes i press lauch and the patcher disappears and the game does not lauch so i click on my lol desktop icon / shortcut to open it and the patch start downloading from the beggining really mad plz help me >:(       ;(

replies.body:
Where do you have League installed to? Is it in the default directory of **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**?

I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure that League has the right administrative privileges to patch and run correctly. Let me know if your issue persists through those changes.
